fields_of_interest: Single market, Banking and financial services
eu_initiatives: Central Securities Depositories Regulation, Financial Collateral Directive, Settlement Finality Directive
organisation_name: Advisory Group on Market Infrastructures for Securities and Collateral (AMI SeCo)
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
position: Membre du MIB - Président du T2S Harmonisation Steering Group
relevant_communication: Projet Target 2 Securities (European Central Bank / Eurosystem)
goals__remit: The AMI SeCo is a forum set up by the European Central Bank to steer and monitor the development of new Eurosystem projects in the areas of cash (Target 2),  securities (T2S) and collateral (Eurosystem Collateral Management System - ECMS). It is composed of representatives from the financial industry (financial institutions, Central Securities Depositories, ...) and from the ECB and national central banks.
